Patrick Morgan

Front End Developer | Music Producer

A few words to check

Hello!

Thanks for stopping by

Download my resume

I’m Patrick. A front-end developer with a passion for design and technology. I’m also apparently very pensive when I drink my coffee.

I started my career as a brand strategist at the global ad agency Leo Burnett in Chicago, where I worked on several fortune 500 accounts including Esurance, MillerCoors and Sprint.

But having big ideas isn’t so much fun if you don’t get to partake in the bringing them to life. So I dropped everything and learned the ins and outs of web development from scratch. First at General Assembly’s Web Development Immersive in NYC, then as a front-end developer on a product design team at American Express.

American Express
